H0.text: who are the senators of hawaii 2012. Daniel Inouye

H1.text: who are the senators of hawaii 2012. Daniel Akaka

H2.text: who are the senators of hawaii 2012. Mazie Hirono

H3.text: who are the senators of hawaii 2012. Hiram Fong

A4.text: Daniel K. Inouye was Hawaii's longest-serving senator from 1963 to 2012.

A5.text: Hawaii's current U.S. senators are Democrats Brian Schatz and Mazie Hirono.

A6.text: Sen. Daniel Akaka of Hawaii called Inouye 'the man who changed the islands forever'

A7.text: Inouye was the second-longest-tenured U.S. senator in history (behind Robert Byrd) and served in the Senate for 49 years
